greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime of the form (q^p-1)/(q-1), where p = prime(n) and q is also prime (q = A123487(n)).
comment: Corresponding smallest primes q are listed in A123487.
a(n) coincides with A084732(n) when A066180(n) is prime or 0.
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Sep 30 2006
